question: Which of the following system calls does not return control to the calling point, on termination?
Which of the following system calls transforms executable binary file into a process?
Which of the following calls never returns an error?
A fork system call will fail if ______________
options: ['a) the previously executed statement is also a fork call', 'b) the limit on the maximum number of processes in the system would be executed', 'c) the limit on the minimum number of processes that can be under execution by a single user would be executed', 'd) all of the mentioned']
option1: a) the previously executed statement is also a fork call
option2: b) the limit on the maximum number of processes in the system would be executed
option3: c) the limit on the minimum number of processes that can be under execution by a single user would be executed

question: If a thread invokes the exec system call ____________
options: ['a) only the exec executes as a separate process', 'b) the program specified in the parameter to exec will replace the entire process', 'c) the exec is ignored as it is invoked by a thread', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option1: a) only the exec executes as a separate process
option2: b) the program specified in the parameter to exec will replace the entire process
option3: c) the exec is ignored as it is invoked by a thread

question: If exec is called immediately after forking ____________
options: ['a) the program specified in the parameter to exec will replace the entire process', 'b) all the threads will be duplicated', 'c) all the threads may be duplicated', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option1: a) the program specified in the parameter to exec will replace the entire process
option2: b) all the threads will be duplicated
option3: c) all the threads may be duplicated

question: If a process does not call exec after forking ____________
options: ['a) the program specified in the parameter to exec will replace the entire process', 'b) all the threads should be duplicated', 'c) all the threads should not be duplicated', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option1: a) the program specified in the parameter to exec will replace the entire process
option2: b) all the threads should be duplicated
option3: c) all the threads should not be duplicated
explanation: The new process is purely based on fork, due to no exec command, duplication will be done.
